decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - The proposed detached garage by reason of inappropriate and prominent siting within the frontage of the site would result in an incongruous form of development out of keeping with the character of the area contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The  London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A, DM1 B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).
Reason : 2 - The proposed single storey front and side extension by reason of excessive width, wedge shaped footprint on a prominent location and inappropriate materials would result in obtrusive form of development contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The  London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A, DM1 B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).
Reason : 3 - The proposed first floor front and side by reason of inappropriate design and scale would result in a bulky and incongruous form of development contrary to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The  London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A, DM1 B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).
description: Single storey front extension; single and two storey side extension, single storey rear extension, raised patio to rear; detached garage to front; external alterations (demolition of attached garage)
